data.title: Hammer, Maul & Mace question.
data.meta_description: Can someone please explain to me the difference between these weapons?
data.text:
That's correct. In the blacksmith UI they refer to the weapon type of "Hammer", and all the weapons you create with it (different styles) are called a mace in the tool tip.

But I think that may be an error because I thought a mace was any type of club style weapon, so a hammer would be a type of mace?

actualy, the whole thing is wrong :P

Mauls are two-handed hammers, they do not have mace-heads like a lot of them do in-game at all

Maces and hammers are two completely different types of weapon, but both use blunt-force trauma as their main way of doing damage to a person. Maces are what are in-game, hammers....are hammers.
